profileAlternative.name: Louis Davidson
profileAlternative.headline: Data Architect Specializing in Relational Database Design with SQL Server
profileAlternative.summary:
Over 15 years in information technology, nearly all of it spent designing, building, implementing, and coding using database technologies, primarily SQL Server. I have written 3 books on the subject of database design, including Pro SQL Server 2005 Database Design and Optimization (http://www.apress.com/book/bookDisplay.html?bID=10005) and am working on the fourth generation of that very same title today.

Specialties: Data Modeling, Relational Database Programming, SQL, T-SqL, Business Intelligence

positions.title: Special Interest Groups
positions.companyName: The Professional Association for SQL Server

positions.title: Author/Speaker
positions.description: Write books, blogs and articles for several outlets about SQL Server and Database Design

positions.title: SQL Server Exam Test Writer/Validator
positions.description: Worked on several of the SQL Server Exams from SQL Server 2008, 2008R2, and 2012

given.text:
Louis "Dr. SQL" Davidson is a wonderful writer. His book "Pro SQL Server 2008 Relational Database Design and Implementation" (http://www.amazon.com/Server-Relational-Database-Design-Implementation/dp/143020866X) holds a special place on my bookshelf. I even got a second copy for my team members at work to use as a reference. I highly recommend Dr. SQL's books!
…
See more

Louis is a DBA's DBA, with the MVP and book authorship credentials to prove it. In three years, I have not been able to ask him a question within his specialty that he could not answer to my satisfaction. I found him a superb colleague in our inter-disciplinary teams and I would recommend him without hesitation.

received.text:
Jessica was a pleasure to work with implementing our Data Warehouse because she knew what she was doing and was a very hard worker.

When it came to the type of models we needed to implement, I learned as much from her as I did from Kimball's Data Modeling Class. She did a tremendous amount of work in the amount of  time she worked with us, and I would definitely work with her again.

I worked with Arnie on a couple of contracts with Lionbridge and Grand Masters, both with Microsoft Learning.  Arnie is a very professional person and did a great job on the team, both as a contributor and at several times as a natural leader.

items: Pro SQL Server 2012 Database Design and Implementation
SQL Server MVP Deep Dives Vol. 2
SQL Server MVP Deep Dives Vol. 2
Performance Tuning with SQL Server Dynamic Management Views

peopleAlsoViewed.text: Helping Businesses Become Data-Driven! | Data Strategy Design | Data Coaching | Organizational Culture Change
Senior Vice President Of Engineering at SentryOne
Principal Consultant / Co-Founder at Database Masters
I design and build solutions that turn your raw data into actionable insights. Let's chat.
